title: State v. Keith Davis, Jr. - Episode 1 - Sunday Morning
description:
April 22, 2019 / On June 7, 2015, Keith Davis Jr. became the first person shot by Baltimore police since the death of Freddie Gray. Keith survived -- and he’s been fighting for his freedom ever since. Not only is Keith Davis Jr a victim of the Baltimore Police Department’s brutality, but like Adnan Syed, he’s one of the many who they have wrongfully accused.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Patrick Cortez, Taylor Quimby. 

This episode was sponsored by Vistaprint.

www.Vistaprint.com/Undisclosed

#undisclosed #freekeithdavisjr
